resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou commented on pull request #4343: ARROW-5371: [Release] Add tests for dev/release/00-prepare.sh
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4343
 
 
   Test is implemented by Ruby and test-unit.
   
   How to test:
   
     * Clone the current Git repository for test
     * Run `dev/release/00-prepare.sh` in test test repository
     * Check diff in `git log -n 1 -p`

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4343#issuecomment-495005833
 
 
   I got the following result on macOS.
   <details><summary>details</summary>
   
   ```rb
   $ dev/release/run-test.rb                                         (git)-[release-prepare-test]
   Loaded suite release
   Started
   .F
   ===============================================================================================
   /Users/shiro/dev/arrow_kou/dev/release/00-prepare-test.rb:29:in `setup'
   /Users/shiro/.rbenv/versions/2.6.0/lib/ruby/2.6.0/tmpdir.rb:89:in `mktmpdir'
   /Users/shiro/dev/arrow_kou/dev/release/00-prepare-test.rb:32:in `block in setup'
   /Users/shiro/dev/arrow_kou/dev/release/00-prepare-test.rb:32:in `chdir'
   /Users/shiro/dev/arrow_kou/dev/release/00-prepare-test.rb:39:in `block (2 levels) in setup'
        73:
        74:   def test_update_version_pre_tag
        75:     prepare("VERSION_PRE_TAG")
     => 76:     assert_equal([
        77:                    {
        78:                      path: "c_glib/configure.ac",
        79:                      hunks: [
   /Users/shiro/dev/arrow_kou/dev/release/00-prepare-test.rb:76:in `test_update_version_pre_tag'
   <[{:hunks=>
      [["-m4_define([arrow_glib_version], 0.14.0-SNAPSHOT)",
        "+m4_define([arrow_glib_version], 0.14.0)"]],
     :path=>"c_glib/configure.ac"},
    {:hunks=>[["-version = '0.14.0-SNAPSHOT'", "+version = '0.14.0'"]],

    {:hunks=>

        "+set(ARROW_VERSION \"0.14.0\")"]],
     :path=>"cpp/CMakeLists.txt"},
    {:hunks=>

        "+    <Version>0.14.0</Version>"]],
     :path=>"csharp/Directory.Build.props"},

      [["-  \"version\": \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  \"version\": \"0.14.0\""]],
     :path=>"js/package.json"},

     :path=>"ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/version.rb"},
    {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],
     :path=>"ruby/red-gandiva/lib/gandiva/version.rb"},

     :path=>"ruby/red-arrow-cuda/lib/arrow-cuda/version.rb"},
    {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],
     :path=>"ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/version.rb"},
    {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],
     :path=>"ruby/red-gandiva/lib/gandiva/version.rb"},
    {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],

    {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],
     :path=>"ruby/red-plasma/lib/plasma/version.rb"},
    {:hunks=>[["-version = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+version = \"0.14.0\""]],
     :path=>"rust/arrow/Cargo.toml"},
    {:hunks=>[["-version = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+version = \"0.14.0\""]],
     :path=>"rust/datafusion/Cargo.toml"},
    {:hunks=>[["-datafusion = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+datafusion = \"0.14.0\""]],
     :path=>"rust/datafusion/README.md"},
    {:hunks=>
      [["-version = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+version = \"0.14.0\""],
       ["-rand = \"0.5\"", "+rand = \"0.5\""]],
     :path=>"rust/parquet/Cargo.toml"},
    {:hunks=>
      [["-parquet = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+parquet = \"0.14.0\""],
       ["-See [crate documentation](https://docs.rs/crate/parquet/0.14.0-SNAPSHOT) on available API.",
        "+See [crate documentation](https://docs.rs/crate/parquet/0.14.0) on available API."]],
     :path=>"rust/parquet/README.md"}]>
   
   diff:
     [{:hunks=>
        [["-m4_define([arrow_glib_version], 0.14.0-SNAPSHOT)",
          "+m4_define([arrow_glib_version], 0.14.0)"]],
       :path=>"c_glib/configure.ac"},
      {:hunks=>[["-version = '0.14.0-SNAPSHOT'", "+version = '0.14.0'"]],
       :path=>"c_glib/meson.build"},
      {:hunks=>
        [["-set(ARROW_VERSION \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\")",
          "+set(ARROW_VERSION \"0.14.0\")"]],
       :path=>"cpp/CMakeLists.txt"},
      {:hunks=>

   ?      "+    <Version>0.14.0</Version>"]],
   +     ["-</Project>", "+</Project>"]],
       :path=>"csharp/Directory.Build.props"},
      {:hunks=>
        [["-  \"version\": \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  \"version\": \"0.14.0\""]],
       :path=>"js/package.json"},
      {:hunks=>
        [["-set(MLARROW_VERSION \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\")",
          "+set(MLARROW_VERSION \"0.14.0\")"]],
       :path=>"matlab/CMakeLists.txt"},
      {:hunks=>
        [["-default_version = '0.14.0-SNAPSHOT'", "+default_version = '0.14.0'"]],
       :path=>"python/setup.py"},
      {:hunks=>[["-Version: 0.13.0.9000", "+Version: 0.14.0"]],
       :path=>"r/DESCRIPTION"},
      {:hunks=>[["-VERSION = 0.13.0.9000", "+VERSION = 0.14.0"]],
       :path=>"r/src/Makevars.win"},
      {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],
       :path=>"ruby/red-arrow-cuda/lib/arrow-cuda/version.rb"},
      {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],
       :path=>"ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/version.rb"},
      {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],

       :path=>"ruby/red-parquet/lib/parquet/version.rb"},
      {:hunks=>[["-  VERSION = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+  VERSION = \"0.14.0\""]],
       :path=>"ruby/red-plasma/lib/plasma/version.rb"},
      {:hunks=>[["-version = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+version = \"0.14.0\""]],
       :path=>"rust/arrow/Cargo.toml"},
      {:hunks=>[["-version = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+version = \"0.14.0\""]],
       :path=>"rust/datafusion/Cargo.toml"},
      {:hunks=>[["-datafusion = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+datafusion = \"0.14.0\""]],
       :path=>"rust/datafusion/README.md"},
   +  {:hunks=>
   ?  {:hunks=>[["-version = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+version = \"0.14.0\""]],
   ?
   +     ["-rand = \"0.5\"", "+rand = \"0.5\""]],
       :path=>"rust/parquet/Cargo.toml"},
      {:hunks=>
        [["-parquet = \"0.14.0-SNAPSHOT\"", "+parquet = \"0.14.0\""],
         ["-See [crate documentation](https://docs.rs/crate/parquet/0.14.0-SNAPSHOT) on available API.",
          "+See [crate documentation](https://docs.rs/crate/parquet/0.14.0) on available API."]],
       :path=>"rust/parquet/README.md"}]
   Failure: test_update_version_pre_tag(PrepareTest)
   ===============================================================================================
   
   Finished in 6.669908 seconds.
   -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2 tests, 2 assertions, 1 failures, 0 errors, 0 pendings, 0 omissions, 0 notifications
   50% passed
   ```
   </details>
   
   We may need to change to add `\n` like the following.
   
   ```diff
   diff --git a/csharp/Directory.Build.props b/csharp/Directory.Build.props
   index 2e345cb8..841f981c 100644
   --- a/csharp/Directory.Build.props
   +++ b/csharp/Directory.Build.props
   @@ -38,4 +38,4 @@
        <Content Include="$(RepoRoot)LICENSE.txt" Pack="true" PackagePath="" />
      </ItemGroup>
   -</Project>
   \ No newline at end of file
   +</Project>
   
   diff --git a/rust/parquet/Cargo.toml b/rust/parquet/Cargo.toml
   index b444a72b..1bf35661 100644
   --- a/rust/parquet/Cargo.toml
   +++ b/rust/parquet/Cargo.toml
   @@ -44,4 +44,4 @@ arrow = { path = "../arrow" }
    [dev-dependencies]
    lazy_static = "1"
   -rand = "0.5"
   \ No newline at end of file
   +rand = "0.5"
   ```
